Headline: Temporary Reroute
ShortDescription: #126 Jackson buses are temporarily rerouted via Jackson, Central, Harrison, and into the terminal, due to a festival near Jackson/Central.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

Buses will operate in both directions via Jackson, Central, Harrison, and then into the terminal.

Allow extra travel time.

 

Why is service being changed?

Buses are rerouted due to Fiesta Boricua.

Headline: #63 63rd Temporary Reroute near 63rd/Eberhart
ShortDescription: 63 63rd buses rtd WB via Cottage Grove, 61st, King Drive & 63rd; EB via 63rd, Prairie, 61st, Cottage Grove & 63rd due to a street blockage near 63rd/Eberhart.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#63 63rd buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near 63rd/Eberhart due to a street blockage.

  • Westbound buses will operate via 63rd, Cottage Grove, 61st, King Drive, then resume their normal route on 63rd.
  • Eastbound buses will operate via 63rd, Prairie, 61st, Cottage Grove, then resume their normal route on 63rd.

Allow extra travel time.
